title: DJ & Peter Schrager's Mock Draft
itunes:title: DJ & Peter Schrager's Mock Draft
description:
On this special episode, DJ is joined by Peter Schrager. DJ selects the odd number picks and Schrager selects the even picks in this mock draft. Find out which quarterbacks will go in the first round, which position group is the deepest and if there are any surprise players that will sneak into the first round.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
